statements: SELECT * FROM named_entities;
SELECT named_entity FROM named_entities;
SELECT text_data FROM named_entities WHERE named_entity = 'PERSON';
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, named_entity FROM named_entities ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities;
SELECT id, named_entity FROM named_entities WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT named_entity, COUNT(*) AS count FROM named_entities GROUP BY named_entity HAVING count > 1;
SELECT * FROM named_entities ORDER BY text_data DESC;
SELECT named_entity, AVG(id) AS average_id FROM named_entities GROUP BY named_entity ORDER BY average_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT entity_type, entity_value FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'person';
SELECT entity_type, entity_value FROM named_entities WHERE id BETWEEN 10 AND 20;
SELECT * FROM text_data ORDER BY id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT text_content FROM text_data WHERE id = 5;
SELECT id, entity_type, entity_value FROM named_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Person' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND entity_type = 'Location';
SELECT entity_type, COUNT(*) AS count FROM named_entities GROUP BY entity_type HAVING count > 1;
SELECT id, text_content FROM text_data WHERE id < 10 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, text_data FROM named_entities WHERE text_data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT entity_id, entity_type FROM entities_metadata WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY entity_id DESC;
SELECT doc_id, text_content FROM text_documents WHERE doc_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, text_data FROM named_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM entities_metadata WHERE confidence_level > 0.8 ORDER BY entity_type ASC;
SELECT doc_id, text_content FROM text_documents WHERE id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT entity_id, entity_type, confidence_level FROM entities_metadata WHERE confidence_level < 0.5 ORDER BY entity_type DESC;
SELECT id, text_data FROM named_entities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND text_data ILIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM named_entities ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT text_data, extracted_entity FROM named_entities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM text_documents WHERE id = 3;
SELECT document_text FROM text_documents ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT entity_type FROM entity_types;
SELECT * FROM named_entities ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE extracted_entity = 'PERSON' ORDER BY text_data ASC LIMIT 10;

SELECT text_data, entity_type FROM named_entities JOIN entity_mappings ON named_entities.id = entity_mappings.entity_id JOIN entity_types ON entity_mappings.entity_id = entity_types.id WHERE entity_type = 'ORGANIZATION';

SELECT named_entities.text_data, COUNT(*) AS entity_count FROM named_entities JOIN entity_mappings ON named_entities.id = entity_mappings.entity_id GROUP BY named_entities.text_data HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;

SELECT named_entities.text_data, text_documents.document_text FROM named_entities JOIN entity_mappings ON named_entities.id = entity_mappings.entity_id JOIN text_documents ON entity_mappings.document_id = text_documents.id LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM named_entities;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities ORDER BY entity_type ASC;
SELECT id, text_content, created_at FROM text_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT named_entity_id, text_id FROM named_entities_mapping ORDER BY named_entity_id DESC;
SELECT text_id, processed_content, processed_at FROM processed_text ORDER BY processed_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM named_entities WHERE entity_type = 'Person';
SELECT text_content, created_at FROM text_data ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT named_entity_id, COUNT(*) AS appearance_count FROM named_entities_mapping GROUP BY named_entity_id ORDER BY appearance_count DESC;
SELECT processed_content FROM processed_text WHERE text_id = 3;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type FROM named_entities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
